scripts.cypress:ci: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config retries=2,video=true --spec 'cypress/e2e/unauthenticated/**/*' --record --parallel --group e2e
scripts.cypress:ci-auth: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config retries=2,video=true --spec 'cypress/e2e/authenticated/**/*' --record --parallel --group e2e-auth
scripts.cypress:ci-build: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config retries=2,video=true,baseUrl=http://localhost:80 --spec 'cypress/e2e/build/**/*' --record --group e2e
scripts.cypress:headless: NODE_ENV=test dotenv-flow -- cypress run --browser chrome --config video=false
scripts.start:e2e: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run start:dev --prefix ./backend & npm run start:e2e-test --prefix ./frontend
scripts.start:mock: LOG_LEVEL=debug npm run mock-and-start --prefix ./backend & npm run start:env-test  --prefix ./frontend
scripts.throughput:test: npm i --prefix ./api-throughput-test && npm run build --prefix ./api-throughput-test -- --env REST=true && NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -- k6 run ./api-throughput-test/build/rest.bundle.js
scripts.throughput:test:graphql: npm i --prefix ./api-throughput-test && npm run build --prefix ./api-throughput-test && NODE_ENV=development dotenv-flow -- k6 run ./api-throughput-test/build/graphql.bundle.js
scripts.size-limit:install: npm install && npm install --prefix ./backend && npm install --prefix ./frontend
scripts.size-limit:build: npm run size-limit:install && npm run build --prefix ./frontend
